dcterms:description: Taxi-v3 is a toy text environment in the OpenAi Gym package where a taxi agent needs to pick up a passenger at one location and drop them off at another, receiving rewards for successful actions and penalties for illegal actions.
dcterms:title: OpenAi Gym environment (Taxi-v3)

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. Graves
I. Antonoglou
D. Wierstra
M. Riedmiller
dcterms:description: CartPole-v1 is a classic control environment in the OpenAI Gym package that simulates an inverted pendulum problem where the goal is to balance the pole upright by controlling the movement of a cart.
dcterms:title: Cart-Pole environment (CartPole-v1)

dcterms:creator: Edouard Leurent
dcterms:description: Highway-env is an autonomous driving simulation environment where the ego-vehicle aims to reach a high speed while avoiding collisions with neighboring vehicles on a multilane highway.
dcterms:title: highway-gym environment (highway-env)
